attributes.action: Award Steve Winwood with an honour to recognise his services to music for over 40 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Steve Winwood has been at the forefront of British music since 1965 with Specer Davis Group, Traffic and Blind Faith. He is a God fearing Christian whp has never been controversial and has brought enjoyment to millions, as well as massive tax benefits to the UK.
